Query.Sentence: WITH t as( SELECT T.*, dv1.device_name as device_in, dv2.device_name as device_out, P.plate_number, TP.trailer_plate_number, DN.delivery_name, t.scan_volume_in - t.scan_volume_out as difference, TO_CHAR((t.datetime_out - t.datetime_in), 'HH24:MI:SS' ) AS duration, (t.calculated_volume/(t.length*t.width*t.height))*100 as occupation, (abs(abs(t.scan_volume_in - t.scan_volume_out) - t.calculated_volume)/t.calculated_volume)*100 as error FROM PUBLIC.travels T LEFT JOIN PUBLIC.delivery_notes DN ON T.id_delivery_note = DN.id_delivery_note LEFT JOIN PUBLIC.devices DV1 ON T.id_dev_in = DV1.id_dev LEFT JOIN PUBLIC.devices DV2 ON T.id_dev_out = DV2.id_dev LEFT JOIN PUBLIC.plates P on T.id_plate = P.id_plate LEFT JOIN PUBLIC.trailer_plates TP on T.id_trailer_plate = TP.id_trailer_plate ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM t #WHERE#

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', datetime_in) AS dia, sum(scan_volume_in) AS volume_in, sum(scan_volume_out) AS volume_out, sum(scan_volume_in) - sum(scan_volume_out) AS balance FROM travels GROUP BY dia ORDER BY dia; #WHERE#
